hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select EOTF.EOTF_ID as EOOF_ID, EOTF.CREATOR as CREATOR, EOTF.CREATE_TIME as CREATE_TIME, EOTF.MODIFIER as MODIFIER, EOTF.MODIFY_TIME as MODIFY_TIME, EOTF.REC_VER as REC_VER, EOTF.REC_STATUS as REC_STATUS, EOTF.ORG_ID as ORG_ID, EOTF.PM_CODE as PM_CODE, EOTF.EOTF_FEE_CODE as EOOF_FEE_CODE, EOTF.EOTF_FEE_NAME as EOOF_FEE_NAME, EOTF.EOTF_FEE_TYPE_CODE as EOOF_FEE_TYPE_CODE, EOTF.EOTF_FEE_TYPE_NAME as EOOF_FEE_TYPE_NAME, EOTF.EOTF_RP_FLAG_CODE as EOOF_RP_FLAG_CODE, EOTF.EOTF_RP_FLAG_NAME as EOOF_RP_FLAG_NAME, EOTF.EOTF_PARTY_TYPE_CODE as EOOF_PARTY_TYPE_CODE, EOTF.EOTF_PARTY_TYPE_NAME as EOOF_PARTY_TYPE_NAME, EOTF.EOTF_PARTY_CODE as EOOF_PARTY_CODE, EOTF.EOTF_PARTY_NAME as EOOF_PARTY_NAME, EOTF.EOTF_MEASURE_TYPE_CODE as EOOF_MEASURE_TYPE_CODE, EOTF.EOTF_MEASURE_TYPE_NAME as EOOF_MEASURE_TYPE_NAME, EOTF.EOTF_QUANTITY as EOOF_QUANTITY, EOTF.EOTF_PRICE as EOOF_PRICE, EOTF.EOTF_AMOUNT as EOOF_AMOUNT, EOTF.EOTF_CURRENCY_CODE as EOOF_CURRENCY_CODE, EOTF.EOTF_CURRENCY_NAME as EOOF_CURRENCY_NAME, EOTF.EOTF_RATE as EOOF_RATE, EOTF.EOTF_ROUND_TYPE_CODE as EOOF_ROUND_TYPE_CODE, EOTF.EOTF_ROUND_TYPE_NAME as EOOF_ROUND_TYPE_NAME, EOTF.EOTF_RP_METHOD_CODE as EOOF_RP_METHOD_CODE, EOTF.EOTF_RP_METHOD_NAME as EOOF_RP_METHOD_NAME, EOTF.EOTF_RP_AMOUNT as EOOF_RP_AMOUNT, EOTF.EOTF_STATUS_CODE as EOOF_STATUS_CODE, EOTF.EOTF_STATUS_NAME as EOOF_STATUS_NAME, EOTF.EOTF_SOURCE_CODE as EOOF_SOURCE_CODE, EOTF.EOTF_SOURCE_NAME as EOOF_SOURCE_NAME, EOTF.EOTF_REMARK as EOOF_REMARK from EO_TEMPLATE_ORDER_FEE EOTF where 1=1 << AND EOTF.EOTF_EOTO_CODE LIKE :code>> << AND EOTF.ORG_ID =:orgId >>
